attributes.action: Put all politicians on Universal Credit
attributes.additional_details: So that the politicians are more sympathetic and understanding to our financial struggles as normal hard working citizens. Why should we work hard to pay their astronomical salaries?
attributes.background: Make this law for every politician. This will bring a substantial revenue back into the UK.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about MP's pay are a matter for the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/
